localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A crazy online island to get lost in, solve puzzles together and stop a rogue A.I. from uploading his malicious code onto the web. Created by Amsterdam based escape room designers Sherlocked and the team behind the new spacial video chat platform Mibo.
blogPost.body: A crazy online island to get lost in, solve puzzles together and stop a rogue A.I. from uploading his malicious code onto the web. Created by Amsterdam based escape room designers Sherlocked and the team behind the new spacial video chat platform Mibo.
blogPost.title: Escape from Mibo Island - An amazing 3D spacial video escape room game
blogPost.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: 一个疯狂的在线岛屿，让你迷失在其中，一起解开谜题，阻止一个无赖的人工智能将他的恶意代码上传到网上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室设计师Sherlocked和新的空间视频聊天平台Mibo背后的团队创建。
localize.tagline: 一个惊人的3D空间视频逃生室游戏。

localize.description: 一個瘋狂的在線島嶼，讓你迷失在其中，一起解開謎題，阻止一個無賴的人工智能將他的惡意代碼上傳到網上。由阿姆斯特丹的逃生室設計師Sherlocked和新的空間視頻聊天平臺Mibo背後的團隊創建。
localize.tagline: 一個驚人的3D空間視頻逃生室遊戲。

previous.excerpt: Collaborate through all phases of the product development process in Kitemaker and keep track of work across Slack, Discord, Figma, and Github. It's still super-fast and has even more hotkeys.
previous.title: Kitemaker - A fast tool for product collaboration and discussions

localize.description: 在Kitemaker中协作完成产品开发过程的所有阶段，并通过Slack、Discord、Figma和Github跟踪工作。它的速度还是超快的，而且有更多的热键。
localize.tagline: 产品协作和讨论的快速工具

localize.description: 在Kitemaker中協作完成產品開發過程的所有階段，並通過Slack、Discord、Figma和Github跟蹤工作。它的速度還是超快的，而且有更多的熱鍵。
localize.tagline: 產品協作和討論的快速工具

next.excerpt: StoryXpress is a video platform for high performing teams with a suite of video tools- webcam & screen recorder, video hosting, video editing & video analytics engine. With custom branding and powerful integrations for sales, marketing customer support tools.
next.title: StoryXpress - Video Platform for High Performing Teams

localize.description: StoryXpress是一个为高绩效团队提供的视频平台，它拥有一套视频工具--网络摄像头和屏幕录像机、视频托管、视频编辑和视频分析引擎。它拥有自定义的品牌和强大的销售、营销、客户支持工具的集成功能。
localize.tagline: 高绩效团队的视频平台

localize.description: StoryXpress是一個爲高績效團隊提供的視頻平臺，它擁有一套視頻工具--網絡攝像頭和屏幕錄像機、視頻託管、視頻編輯和視頻分析引擎。它擁有自定義的品牌和強大的銷售、營銷、客戶支持工具的集成功能。
localize.tagline: 高績效團隊的視頻平臺
